content.raw: It turns out that the symbol visibility wasn't causing the problem (though I think it should still be made consistent.)  It was the fact that libgazebo_player needs to be linked with gazebo_physics and gazebo_sensors, and the fact that gazebo/gazebo.cc was being included as part of the player plugin's sources, which caused undefined references to private internal symbols.  I resolved all of the issues in pull request #2418.
content.html: It turns out that the symbol visibility wasn't causing the problem (though I think it should still be made consistent.) It was the fact that libgazebo_player needs to be linked with gazebo_physics and gazebo_sensors, and the fact that gazebo/gazebo.cc was being included as part of the player plugin's sources, which caused undefined references to private internal symbols. I resolved all of the issues in pull request #2418.
